title: Three negative feelings that can sometimes be good
itunes:author: David B. Feldman - psychology | social science | politics | mental health
itunes:summary: There may be a good reason that human beings evolved the ability to experience negative emotions: In measured amounts, they can protect us from harm and help us to be successful.
